wikipedia_page.main: Tommy Todd (1 June 1926 – 7 December 2014) was a Scottish footballer who played as a centre-forward for Airdrieonians and Hamilton Academical in the Scottish Football League and Crewe Alexandra, Derby County and Rochdale in the (English) Football League.

response: **Tommy Todd, 88, footballer (Airdrie, Hamilton, Crewe, Derby and Rochdale).

* 7 December 2014: Tommy Todd, 88, former Crewe Alexandra, Derby County and Rochdale forward.
